subject: Extension of time period of Panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1&2)
text: IRdly 754 WTHRf qiferazrut (7sw 9aav er rTHRf FAY, Ra TRTT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) aza T 6i-5 Qd 6, Td27-10, @RdM, 76f @aait 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TH/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Dispute Resolution/2023 Policy Circular No. 2.1.57/ 2023 dated 28th April, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD /CCIEExtn. /2020-21 (Comp. No. 5472)} Sub: Extension of time period of panel of Independent Experts of Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts (CCIEs 1 & 2) reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No_ 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017 established a conciliation and settlement mechanism for the early resolution and settlement of claims arising out of the contractual disputes under the contract agreements with the contractors/ concessionaires/ consultants in NHAI. The two Conciliation and Settlement Committees were constituted and published vide para 4.3 of Policy Circular 2.1.23/2017 dated 02.06.2017. As per Annexure-1 of the Policy Circular, the panel of Independent Experts approved under these guidelines was valid upto 01.06.2020. 2 _ At present, the composition of these two Committees is as under: Conciliation & Settlement Committee -1 Conciliation Settlement Committee-2 INames of the Members NNames of the Members 1_ Sh_Pradeep Kumar 1. Justice [.P. Vasishtha (Retd  12 Sh. Y.S. Malik pShAK_Upadhyay; 3_ Sh: AV. Sinha 3_ Sh_ V. V_Ranganathan 3_ The tenure /terms of the Committees was extended from 02.06.20 to 01.06.21 vide letter dated 02.06.20, from 02.06.21 to 01.06.22 vide letter dated 24.05.21 and further extended from 02.06.22 to 01.06.23 vide letter dated 18.05.22. 4_ Now the Competent Authority has extended the tenure/terms of the aforesaid two Committees for a further period of one i.e. from 02.06.2023 to 01.06.2024. 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 0l/ 23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
